vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.21;
son of: Chislon (H3692)
§ Elidad = "my God has loved"
a Benjamite chief who helped apportion his tribe's allotment to the Promised Land
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Quislón; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利達 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我神已經喜愛"
便雅憫族首領, 幫忙分配其支派所分得的應許之地 (民 34:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以利达 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我神已经喜爱"
便雅悯族首领, 帮忙分配其支派所分得的应许之地 (民 34:21)
